module.name: Info Services
module.description: Provides a number of applications accessible by feature codes: company directory, call trace (last call information), echo test, speaking clock, and speak current extension number.
module.changelog: *2.11.0.3* #6026 *2.11.0.2* #6923 Fix language not being set on Echo Test and Speaking Clock *2.11.0.1* #6026 *2.11.0.0* #6021 *2.10.0.3* remove obsoleted directory feature code *2.10.0.2* #5115 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.0* #4653
